title: #426 PumpRules: Reunited AF
description:
It's time for the Vanderpump Rules reunion! TV writer and producer Marcos Luevanos joins Ben and Ronnie to break down all the memorable moments from part one of this pure madness. Come join in!

See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
